title: Typing Contest Event CPI
description: The CPI IT Club-sponsored ICT Cup is not your typical competition. It's a special occasion that motivates IT pros to take a break from their typical tech routine and enjoy mingling in a laid-back and fun environment.

title: Hackathon Challenge 2025
description: Join the ultimate coding marathon! Collaborate, innovate, and compete for exciting rewards in a 24-hour hackathon event.

title: Graphic Design Showdown
description: A creative event where designers battle it out with their best digital artwork. Show your skills, win rewards, and gain recognition.
